description.value: As a Reaction, after hitting a ranged or melee attack, character can make +0 Wrangling Test. If successful one of their Bestial Minions gain +20 to the next Attack Action made against that target until the end of its next turn.

system.benefit: As a Reaction, after hitting a ranged or melee attack, character can make +0 Wrangling Test. If successful one of their Bestial Minions gain +20 to the next Attack Action made against that target until the end of its next turn.
